title: Why am I not honor 5 by now?
body: Last season I was honor 5 in EASILY half the time. Remember Riot, the main reason the old honor system went to shit is because you didnt get anything for giving out honor. I cant help but feel youve done the same thing with this system now? I demand everything be given to me for free btw haHAA

replies.body:
if u want the simple answer... last season honor was introduced  very late into season 7

riot still wanted people to hit honor 5, so they made climb much easier because people only had like 3 months to get their honor to reach 5

this season however it started from the first day of the season.. so they have the honor gain at the normal rate

Have you ever thought that maybe the honor system is going the way RIOT said it would? 

Riot said the only reason it progressed fast last season was because the system was put in half way through the season already.

So obv it's going to take longer when it's here for the full season.
Why aren't I honour 0 checkpoint 1 yet?

> [{quoted}](name=Ok sure but why,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Gv8yA46E,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-07-02T22:19:20.020+0000)
>
> Why aren't I honour 0 checkpoint 1 yet?

He's the person who is toxic once in a while and or creates another account and flames everyone but on this "main" account, he is 'innocent'.
